Question: Shida Battery Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shida Battery Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Lithium Polymer Battery

- High power, high capacity, high C rate, high quality
- Full product range
- Used in unmanned aerial aircraft, energy storage systems, jump starters, R/C toys, robots, power tools, and portable products
- Sold in over 50 countries
- Founded in 1996
- Participates in various exhibitions
- Showcased lithium polymer battery products at various international events
- Specializes in designing, manufacturing, and marketing lithium polymer batteries and Ni-MH batteries
Summary_cn:
施达电池科技有限公司。

产品：锂聚合物电池

- 高功率、高容量、高放电倍率、高质量
- 全产品范围
- 用于无人机、能源储存系统、跳线启动器、遥控玩具、机器人、电动工具和便携产品
- 在50多个国家销售
- 成立于1996年
- 参加各种展览活动
- 在各种国际事件中展示锂聚合物电池产品
- 专注于设计、制造和推广锂聚合物电池和镍氢电池
